about_the_game:
"Tuber Paranoia: The Art Book" is a digital art book that combines elements from the game, including the following elements.

  • 14 in-game CG illustrations

  • 2 sets of character illustrations with Spine (Hiyoru, Hayuri)

  • Standing illustration 1 type (Kuro)

  • 29 types of in-game BGM

  • 6 kinds of commentary from the producers

  • 9 Templelet Images with Game Elements

  • Participating voice actor full voice compilation 3 (Hiyoru, Hayuri, Kuro)

  • Butuber Paranoia Fan Art Event Participation in 10 Chapters

  • Including a number of other festival illustrations

※ Operation method: Proceed through mouse click

※ How to operate: You can use the button quickly if you scroll with your mouse on top of the button.

※ This DLC can be found in the "vtuber_artbook" folder within the folder where the "Vertuber Paranoia" game is installed.

※ You can check the full screen image by clicking "HIDE UI" among the options below.

※ The BGM used in the game is a commercially available CC0 grade sound source, and the DLC includes the composers' nicknames and set song names.
